blog based on git-pages

### dependency

```
# theme:
git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia
```

### dev with hexo

dev:
```
hexo clean
hexo generate
hexo server
```

deploy:

```
hexo clean
hexo generate
hexo deploy
```
